<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the details of a specific customer account, including KYB status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"account_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The ID of the account","schema":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Details of the requested account","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"Account","type":"object","description":"The details of a customer account","properties":{"id":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Current KYB / onboarding status of the account","enum":["complete","pending","rejected"],"example":"complete"},"business_name":{"type":"string","example":"ABC Company Inc"},"ein":{"type":"string","example":"111-11-1111"},"business_type":{"type":"string","example":"Corporation"},"address":{"title":"AccountAddress","type":"object","properties":{"street_line_1":{"type":"string","example":"123 Main St"},"street_line_2":{"type":"string","example":"Apt C"},"city":{"type":"string","example":"Des Moines"},"state":{"type":"string","example":"Iowa"},"zip":{"type":"string","example":"12345"},"country":{"type":"string","example":"USA"}},"required":["street_line_1","city","state","zip","country"]},"phone_number":{"type":"string","example":"2134678902"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","example":"mark@example.com"},"website":{"type":"string","example":"abccompany.com"},"ultimate_beneficial_owners":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"UltimateBeneficialOwner","type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"John Doe"},"ssn":{"type":"string","example":"222-22-2222"},"address":{"title":"AccountAddress","type":"object","properties":{"street_line_1":{"type":"string","example":"123 Main St"},"street_line_2":{"type":"string","example":"Apt C"},"city":{"type":"string","example":"Des Moines"},"state":{"type":"string","example":"Iowa"},"zip":{"type":"string","example":"12345"},"country":{"type":"string","example":"USA"}},"required":["street_line_1","city","state","zip","country"]}},"required":["name","ssn","address"]}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
